name: 45 Seconds Until Destruction
description: You have to choose the right answer in order to finish the game! I wasn't going to make a game because it was irritating me but then 3-4 days before the end i decided. There is one level and a bonus level plus the You Win! room. The Bonus Level is a secret area in the You Win! room. I made this game In Stencyl! I hope you enjoy! If you don't pass the level within 45 seconds then you will blow up and get destroyed!
